name: Die Space
description:
Theme: Die Space

You escaped from the destroyed ship and your shuttle landed on some planet. Yes, the planet is inhabited, but here's the problem, there are only plants and alas, instead of oxygen, everything on this planet breathes with carbon dioxide and there is no oxygen. You are running out of oxygen and you urgently need to get to the escape capsule.

Controls:

Input A and D to move
Input space to jump
